name: Counterspell
summary: When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your magic to disrupt it.

name: Eschew Materials
summary: You can use clever workarounds to replicate the arcane essence of certain materials.

name: Familiar
summary: You make a pact with a creature that serves you and assists your spellcasting.

name: Hand of the Apprentice
summary: You can magically hurl your weapon at your foe.

name: Reach Spell
summary: You can extend your spells’ range.

name: Spellbook Prodigy
summary: You are particularly adept at learning spells to add to your spellbook.

name: Widen Spell
summary: You manipulate the energy of your spell, causing it to spread out and affect a wider area.

name: Cantrip Expansion
summary: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

name: Conceal Spell
summary: Through sheer mental effort, you can simplify the incantations and gestures needed to spellcast, leaving them barely noticeable.

name: Energy Ablation
summary: As you direct destructive energy at a foe, you can divert some of its power into a protective barrier that shields you from harm.

name: Enhanced Familiar
summary: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

name: Nonlethal Spell
summary: You can alter offensive spells to be less deadly.

name: Bespell Strikes
summary: You siphon spell energy into one weapon you’re wielding, or into one of your unarmed attacks, such as a fist.

name: Call Bonded Item
summary: You're mystically connected to your bonded item and can call it to your hand.

name: Call Wizardly Tools
summary: You’re mystically connected to your wizardly tools, ensuring you can always find them when you’ve misplaced them.

name: Irezoko Tattoo
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana or Expert in Occultism
summary: Your face bears an intricate magical tattoo known as the _irezoko_, a badge of your understanding of your chosen field of magic and a recognition of your advancement within Absalom's College of Mysteries.

name: Linked Focus
summary: You have linked your bonded item to the well of energy that powers your school spells.

name: Silent Spell
summary: You’ve learned how to cast many of your spells without speaking the words of power you would normally need to provide.

name: Spell Protection Array
summary: You inscribe a circle of arcane runes that dampen enemies’ magic.

name: Undying Conviction
prerequisite: able to create or control undead; cleric with a negative font, oracle of bones, or necromancer wizard
summary: Your presence has a bolstering effect on your undead minions.

name: Convincing Illusion
summary: You use your deceptive skills to make your illusions seem even more real.

name: Detonating Spell
summary: Your spell becomes volatile and explosive.

name: Explosive Arrival
summary: Your summoned creature appears in a detonation of arcane runes.

name: Irresistible Magic
summary: You’ve studied ways of overcoming the innate defenses against magic that dragons, otherworldly beings, and certain other powerful creatures have.

name: Split Slot
summary: You can prepare two spells in one slot, giving you the freedom to choose the spell when you cast it.

name: Steady Spellcasting
summary: You don’t lose spells easily. If a reaction would disrupt your spellcasting action, attempt a DC 15 flat check. If you succeed, your action isn’t disrupted.

name: Advanced School Spell
summary: You gain access to the advanced teachings of your arcane institution, learning a powerful new school spell.

name: Bond Conservation
summary: By efficiently and carefully manipulating the arcane energies unleashed by your bonded item, you can conserve just enough power to cast another spell, though this second spell is slightly weaker.

name: Chaotic Spell
summary: Your foe can hardly predict and counter your moves if you yourself have no idea what will happen.

name: Form Retention
summary: You have trained your mind and body to tolerate polymorph magic for longer periods of time, so long as you prepare for the change appropriately.

name: Helt's Spelldance
summary: Ranik Helt knows a special technique to hide his spells as part of a performance, and you've learned this technique.

name: Knowledge is Power
summary: Your academic knowledge about a creature allows you to subtly alter your magic to defeat them.

name: Universal Versatility
prerequisite: universalist wizard; Hand of the Apprentice
summary: You can access the fundamental abilities of any school of magic.

name: Overwhelming Energy
summary: With a complex gesture, you call upon the primal power of your spell to overcome enemies’ resistances.

name: Quickened Casting
summary: If your next action is to cast a cantrip or a spell that is at least 2 ranks lower than the highest-rank spell slot you have, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action).

name: Scroll Adept
summary: During your daily preparations, you can create two temporary scrolls containing arcane spells from your spellbook.

name: Clever Counterspell
summary: You creatively apply your prepared spells to Counterspell a much wider variety of your opponents’ magic.

name: Forcible Energy
summary: You perform complex manipulations to make the energy from your spells so powerful that your enemies remain vulnerable to it afterward.

name: Keen Magical Detection
summary: You sense magical dangers.

name: Magic Sense
summary: You have a literal sixth sense for ambient magic in your vicinity.

name: Necromancer's Visage
prerequisite: ability to create or control undead; cleric with a negative font, oracle of bones, or necromancer wizard
summary: Necromantic energy demonstrates your power over undead, creating a demeanor that commands their fear and respect.

name: Bonded Focus
summary: Your connection to your bonded item increases your focus pool.

name: Reflect Spell
summary: When you successfully use Counterspell to counteract a spell that affects targeted creatures or an area, you can turn that spell’s effect back on its caster.

name: Secondary Detonation Array
summary: You divert some of your spell’s energy into an unstable runic array.

name: Sepulchral Sublimation
prerequisite: ability to create or control undead; cleric with a negative font, oracle of bones, or necromancer wizard
summary: You repurpose the negative energy that flows through your minions at a moment's notice.

name: Shift Spell
summary: You move an active spell's area to a new location.

name: Superior Bond
summary: When you draw upon your bonded item, you can leave a bit of energy within it for later use.

name: Effortless Concentration
summary: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

name: Scintillating Spell
summary: Your spells become a radiant display of light and color.

name: Spell Tinker
summary: You’ve learned to alter choices you make when casting spells on yourself.

name: Infinite Possibilities
summary: You can prepare a spell slot that exists in your mind as many different possibilities at once.

name: Reprepare Spell
summary: You’ve discovered how to reuse some of your spell slots over and over.

name: Second Thoughts
summary: When your target proves resilient to your magical deceptions, you can try them again on someone else.

name: Archwizard's Might
summary: You have mastered the greatest secrets of arcane magic.

name: Reclaim Spell
summary: You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the resonant reflections.

name: Spell Combination
summary: You can merge spells, producing multiple effects with a single casting.

name: Spell Mastery
summary: You have mastered a handful of spells to such a degree that you can cast them even if you haven’t prepared them in advance.

name: Spellshape Mastery
summary: Your mastery of magic ensures that you can alter your spells just as easily as you can cast them normally.

name: Worldsphere Gravity
summary: Though creating demiplanes usually requires lengthy rituals, you know how to establish minor planar effects.
